data.title: OFFICIAL GAZETTE
data.text: OFFICIAL GAZETTE GOVERNMENT PRINTING BUREAU ETSIQL1SH EDITION --t-Bm-mMm^mw EXTRA , FRIDAY, MARCH ,7, 1947 Public Notice of Screening Result No. 2 (Feb. 16-Feb.28, 1947) March 7, 1947 Chief secretary of the Cabinet ' HAYASHI Joji J. This table shows the screening result of the Central Public Service Screening Committee, in accordance with the provisions of the Imperial Ordinances No. 1 to No. 3 inclusive of 1947, and the Cabinet and Home Ministry Ordinance No. 1 of the same year.* 2. This table is to be most widely made public. The office of a city, ward, town or village, shall placard, upon receipt of this official report, the said table. This table shall be at least placarded for a month, and it shall, upon receipt of the next official report, be replaced by a new one. Thevold report which is replaced, shall not be destroyed, but be bound and preserved at the office of the city, ward, town or village, in order that it may serve for the public perusal. 3. The questionnaire of the person who is published on this table and who has passed the screening, may be offered for the public perusal, at the office of the Central Public Service Screening Committee, or at the office of the Public Service Screening Committee of metropolis^ region, prefecture or city concerned. Any one may, at his request, unrestrictedly peruse the questionnaire as prescribed in the preceding paragraph. ' v 4. Result:.... Central Public Service Screening Committee (No. 1, 2-chome, Nagata-cho, Kojimachi-ku, Tokyo Metropolis) Number of screened persons: 7159 - Number of determined non-applicables ; 7159 Public services and names of persons passed screening ( 1 ) Principal personal of public service at Mie Special Prefecture: Mie-Prefecture.
